publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1552 Tommy Sheridan: Condolences to the Family of Gordon Gentle-That the Parliament expresses its deepest condolences to the family of Gordon Gentle who was tragically killed in Iraq on 28 June 2004 at the age of only 19, and conveys our thoughts, love and solidarity to Rose and George, his mother and father, and Pamela and Maxine, his two sisters.

S2M-1552 Tommy Sheridan: Condolences to the Family of Gordon Gentle-That the Parliament expresses its deepest condolences to the family of Gordon Gentle who was tragically killed in Iraq on 28 June 2004 at the age of only 19, and conveys our thoughts, love and solidarity to Rose and George, his mother and father, and Pamela and Maxine, his two sisters.
S2M-1552 Condolences to the Family of Gordon Gentle (lodged on 29 June 2004) Rosie Kane*, Colin Fox*
